validation.multimediaCountRange: Number of illustrations must be between 0 and 50
validation.videoCountRange: Number of videos must be between 0 and 20
validation.talkNumberTooLong: Talk number cannot be longer than 10 characters
validation.titleTooShort: Title must be at least 3 characters
validation.titleTooLong: Title cannot be longer than 500 characters
validation.firstNameTooLong: First name cannot be longer than 100 characters
validation.lastNameTooLong: Last name cannot be longer than 100 characters
validation.phoneInvalid: Phone number must be 9 digits (format: XXX-XXX-XXX)
validation.archivedInvalid: Archived flag must be a boolean
validation.statusInvalid: Invalid status value. Must be 'circuit_overseer', 'will_be_replaced', or null
validation.invalidDateFormat: Application error: invalid date format. Contact administrator.
validation.dateMustBeFuture: Date must be in the future
validation.speakerSourceTypeInvalid: Invalid speaker source type. Must be 'visiting_speaker' or 'local_publisher'
validation.speakerOrPublisherRequired: You must select either a visiting speaker or a local publisher
validation.customTalkTitleTooLong: Custom talk title cannot be longer than 200 characters
validation.talkIdOrCustomTitleRequired: You must select a talk or enter a custom talk title
validation.invalidFileType: Invalid file type (PDF, JPG, or PNG only)
validation.atLeastOneFieldRequired: At least one field is required for update
